items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting Style, Great Quality and Fabric.. Just needs a size chart!
items.body: First of all upon opening the package, I really liked the fabric of this dress. I could instantly tell that it was a good quality and a high quality as well. It really is an expensive looking material which almost appears like a metallic or metal type of a material. The dress is lined, which is good because otherwise it would be more like a swim cover-up. It is a very fitted dress. It does have a little bit of stretch, but not a lot. I ordered a medium so I would say this runs a little small because I normally wear a small. I probably need to be on a diet after the Halloween, but nevertheless, I still have been wearing my small sizes and this Medium is not very stretchy. I do like it, but I feel like if I lose 10 pounds maybe it won’t be so short. It’s not bad, but it is short. There are no zippers. It’s just pull it over your head and put it on so it’s not any sort of zipper at the waist. One thing I would say needs improvement for this brand is that I searched trying to find a size chart. I didn’t find one on other listings and I didn’t find one in this listing. Thus, I kind of had to guess what size to order. I almost started to order a small because there were sizes in XX small and X small and in that case, I normally would wear a small because there’s two other smaller sizes. However, something told me to go ahead and get the medium, and even the medium was a little more fitted and shorter than I would prefer. I do like the dress I think it’s cute. It is a great material.. expensive looking. The only thing I would just say is to include a size chart in all of the listings, including this one. I think I like this brand. It has really unique designs and appears to be of a good quality. Read more
items.author: Elleindeed19

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering!
items.body: I bought this dress for a friend’s birthday night out and WOW — it exceeded every expectation. The metallic knit fabric has the perfect amount of shimmer without feeling scratchy or cheap. It stretches in all the right places and really moves with you, which I wasn’t expecting from something that looks this glam. The high neckline paired with the asymmetric bust cutout is such a gorgeous design choice. It’s sexy without being over the top, and I got multiple compliments on the unique cut before I even made it to the restaurant. The mini length and fitted silhouette were super flattering, but I still felt totally comfortable sitting, dancing, and walking around. My favorite part is the sarong-style skirt with the real tie detail. You can adjust it slightly to fit your shape, and it gives the dress a draped look that feels expensive and intentional. And the fact that it’s pull-on is the cherry on top — no struggling with zippers or weird clasps. I rarely wear something straight out of the package without tailoring, but this dress was perfect as-is. If you want something that photographs beautifully, feels amazing on, and makes you feel like a million bucks, this is it. I’m already planning to order another color for New Year’s. Read more
items.author: Jerry L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot!
items.body: This is a really sexy gold chain-like dress. The material is like gold chain material with a good quality dress material underneath. This is definitely a mini dress in length. It is comfortable on, but care for this dress is definitely delicate. I’m not sure if the quality is showing in these pictures but this dress is definitely really high quality and does not look cheap at all. This is high quality, not like a SHEIN dress. I love it! Read more
items.author: Cassandra D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a classy, sleek, and sexy gold Tiger Mist Azelma dress in gold, size Large
items.body: This Tiger Mist Azelma Dress in gold is absolutely stunning! Although I would like to tone up my body a bit before I wear it out, it fits perfectly. The material falls so elegantly and feels and looks almost like metal. Classy and sophisticated but also super sexy. I love it! I am 5'8" tall and weigh 165 pounds, bust is a 40DD, and I got a large. Perfect. Read more
items.author: Southern Mama

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Silver. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
